vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.5;
son of: Obed-edom (H5654);
brother of: Shemaiah (H8098I), Jehozabad (H3075H), Joah (H3098I), Sachar (H7940), Nethanel (H5417K), Issachar (H3485H) and Ammiel (H5988I)
§ Peulthai = "work"
a Levite gatekeeper, the 8th son of Obed-edom; also 'Peullethai'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Obed-edom; levita; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
毗烏利太 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "工作"
一位負責守門的利未人, 俄別-以東的第八個兒子 ( #代上26:5| )
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
毗乌利太 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "工作"
一位负责守门的利未人, 俄别-以东的第八个儿子 ( #代上26:5| )
